benchmark_details.name: Raccoon: Prompt Extraction Benchmark of LLM-Integrated Applications
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce the Raccoon benchmark which comprehensively evaluates a modelâ€™s susceptibility to prompt extraction attacks. The benchmark encompasses 14 categories of prompt extraction attacks and assesses models under both defenseless and defended scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To establish a systematic benchmark for assessing LLM robustness against prompt extraction attacks.

data.source: Generated and sampled from various LLM-integrated applications.
data.size: 197 distinct instruction prompts from GPT-integrated applications

methodology.calculation: ASR is calculated by the success rate of attacks over the instruction prompts based on Rouge-L scores.
methodology.interpretation: A lower ASR indicates a model has better defenses against prompt extraction attacks.
methodology.validation: The benchmark tested multiple models across various scenarios.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: PII was removed from the data prior to publishing.
